[Page Title: About the Bar | The Dinghy]

top of page 
THE DINGHY'S STORY
The origin of The Dinghy came from the potential of a small vacant building located in the Front Beach District of The Isle of Palms. As one of the owners of The Windjammer, Malcolm Burgis wanted to put something in the vacant building adjacent the Windjammer. He asked his Friend, and Ten Year employee, Bret Jones, his thoughts on the building. Bret came to him with a dream and a few sketches. After some consideration, the Dinghy was born. ​ The Dinghy has a laid back Key West Vibe, great food options, and many unique Beers on Tap. The Dinghy features a spacious side porch, which features Live Music during Happy Hour, plenty of TVs, an Internet Juke Box, games and a friendly staff. Come check it out for yourself! We hope to be one of your stops on your tour of the beautiful Isle of Palms. SAY HELLO Have a question about the bar? Just wanna say hi? Have a good joke to share? Drop us a line! 8 J.C. Long Blvd. Isle of Palms, SC 29451  / dinghyiop@gmail.com T  /  843.242.8310 Success! Message received. Send bottom of page

The Bar
The Menu Happy Hour Check out our live music calendar and come enjoy some tunes on the patio. A favorite spot for both locals and guests of the IOP, learn more about our humble beginnings.
